data.actual_result: Only the modal closes but not the keyboard. Note that it doesn't happen when using the Kick and Ban option directly on mini profile, only happens in user management screen
data.expected_result: Both modal and keyboard should close
data.short_description: In the user management screen, and only on this screen, if you open Kick or Ban modal, focus the reason field and close the modal, the keyboard will stay open
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with kick or ban permission - Open someone's mini profile - Tap Manage User - Scroll down to below roles where Kick, Ban and Transfer Ownership options are located - Open either Kick or Ban modal - Focus Reason textfield - Tap outside the modal to close it
